{{ doc.salutation or '' }} {{ doc.employee_name or '' }}
{{ doc.current_address or '' }}

Dear {{ doc.salutation or '' }} {{ doc.employee_name or '' }}

Sub: Extension of Contract with Revision of CTC


We are pleased to inform you that your contractual employment with Mercantile Ventures Limited has been extended for a period of {{doc.year_of_period_in_extension or ''}} year, effective from {{doc.contract_end_date or ''}} with the revised CTC of {{doc.revised_ctc or ''}}/-, as per the pay structure annexed herewith.


We take this opportunity to congratulate you and express our appreciation for your valuable contribution in achieving the objectives of the company. We are confident that you will continue your good work in the same spirit of commitment and sincerity.

All other terms and conditions of your employment as per your appointment order and subsequent modification thereof, remain unchanged.

Thanking you,


Yours sincerely,
For {{ doc.company }}




K GOPALAKRISHNAN
DIRECTOR

Encl: As Above
